text:
Hi Everyone,

I would like to add a recent "Webinar" post (a different blog type) to my monthly "Podcast" blog newsletter subscription email. How can I do this?
A workflow? Your subscription base should be on a list. I am not sure I fully understand the question. But I think since you mentioned email you have to leverage marketing hub.
I would like to create and send an email to a list of HubSpot contacts, using the HubSpot API
